title: [Java] - Multilayer Perceptron (MLP) from Scratch
description: I implemented an MLP from scratch using [Java]. I used Back Propagation, Genetic Algorithms, and Particle Swarm Optimization to train a network.

title: Airwareness - Air Quality and Sharing Mobile Application
description: Worked with a team of five to develop a mobile application that displays air quality data from the government's API. I was responsible for developing a feature that allows to get GPS coordinates and get heat spot data form api NASAs FIRMS

title: CapSnap - Capstone Project
description: Flutter based android application for product browsing, checkout in real time and has feature like camera streaming that streaming to a self trained AI classification server in real time

title: GO Basic RESTful API in GoLang
description: Build in an MVC structure and connect to a MySQL database that offers endpoints for users, posts, task services with JWT authentication.

title: C# .Net Basic RESTful API RESTful API
description: Learn and build in an .NET Framework for all CRUD with data validations for villas endpoints that have swagger API Document and connect to a SQL database.

title: CARIN
description: It is a single-player online strategy game. It features genetic code parser and interpreter for game's characters, and multi-threaded server support for concurrent playing games.
techstack: Game - Java Spring WebSocket / React / TypeScript / CSS / HTML
